casebody.data:
NO. CAAP-17-0000424 Intermediate Court of Appeals of Hawai'i. June 25, 2018

MEMORANDUM OPINION

Nolan FRASER, Plaintiff-Appellant,
v.
STATE of Hawai'i; Thomas Read, Defendants-Appellees,
and
John Does 1-10, Jane Does 1-10; Doe Partnerships 1-10; Doe Corporations 1-10; and Doe Governmental Entities 1-10, Defendants

Affirmed in part. Vacated in part. Remanded.
